job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p>Senior Machine Learning/AI Engineer</p><p><br></p><p>Experience:- 7-10 Years</p><p>Location :- Bangalore</p><p>Salary :- 30-35 Lacs</p><p>Immediate Joiner or those who are serving Notice Period can apply.</p><p><br></p><p>Overview (With Technical Skills):</p><p><br></p><p>SAS Platform (Programming/ Developer)</p><p>▪ Have 7+ years of professional experience in machine learning or quantitative analysis or have a Ph.D. in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or Physics.</p><p>▪ Have excellent programming and algorithmic skills.</p><p>▪ Are proficient with Python and experience with data processing tools (e.g., SciPy, NumPy, Pandas, PyTorch, and Apache Spark).</p><p>▪ Have an in-depth understanding of supervised and unsupervised machine learning algorithms. Knowledge of engineering causal models and convolutional neural networks a big plus.</p><p>▪ Have proven track record of deploying learning algorithms in a production system.</p><p>▪ Have demonstrated end-to-end ownership of projects</p><p>▪ Have stellar listening and explanation skills</p><p><br></p><p>Key Responsibilities:</p><p>➢ Deliver state-of-the-art, causal algorithms to production for optimizing consumer product metrics</p><p>➢ Build and maintain the infrastructure for data and model management</p><p>➢ Work closely with the Turing design and engineering teams for machine learning-adjacent components, such as visualization, ad-hoc data analysis, and data processing</p><p>➢ Give talks, write blog posts, and produce peer-reviewed publications</p><p>➢ Define and lead the development of longer-term Turing Platform capabilities.</p><p><br></p><p>Compensation &amp; Perks:</p><p>• Remote-friendly work environment</p><p>• Collaborative culture</p><p>• Mentorship from machine learning pioneers</p><p>• Competitive salary with generous equity. You get to join the company at the most advantageous stage</p><p>• Directly impact the growth of the company</p><p>• Play a significant role in strategizing the product roadmap</p><p>• Reimbursement of home-office setup</p>
